name: Custom Profile Image
description: Customize your profile with a custom image

image.name: Image File
image.description: Path that leads to the image (leave blank for normal button), may not work with some images.

heightscale.name: Scale Depending on Height
heightscale.description: Scales the image depending on the image's height instead of width. Use this if the image doesn't fit properly when scaled depending on the width.

circleb.name: Circle Border
circleb.description: Crops the image to make it a circle, and adds a border to it.

profile.name: Show in Profile Menu
profile.description: Shows the image in the Profile Menu, duh.

showerror.name: Show invalid Image Error
showerror.description: Shows error popup in menu if the loaded image is not valid.

animatedpictureheaders.name: Animated Profile Images
animatedpictureheaders.description: Settings for animated profile images. These settings only apply to animated images.

loopimage.name: Loop Animated Image
loopimage.description: Choose if the selected animated image will loop.

playbackspeed.name: Animated Image Playback Speed
playbackspeed.description: Sets the playback speed of the selected animated image. Negative values will play the animated image in reverse.

onespecificframe.name: Animated Image Specific Frame
onespecificframe.description: Sets the specific frame of the selected animated image. If the playback speed is 0.00, this is the frame the animated image will use. Otherwise, this is the frame the animated image will start playing from.
